entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 5:30 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 3 cm along parts of the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
